# type: 
#new type: 
#	0 = Mario
#	10 = Solid Platform
#	20 = Empty Question Block
#	21 = Coin Question Block
#	22 = Level Up Question Block
#	30 = Background
#	40 = Hard block
#	50 = Color block
#	60 = Pipe
#	61 = Normal piranha plant pipe
#	62 = Fire piranha plant pipe
#	71 = Goomba spawner
